Basic Wiring Harness.description: Pre-assembled bundles of conductive wiring with simple connectors. Speeds up assembly of basic electronic devices.

Standard Servo Motor.description: A common electro-mechanical actuator used in robotics, automated doors, and simple machinery.

Hydraulic Piston (Small).description: A basic hydraulic piston for providing linear force in small-scale applications like landing gear or sample collectors.

Magnetic Containment Ring.description: A simple ring emitter generating a weak magnetic field. Used in basic shielding or material handling.

Basic CPU Core.description: A low-power central processing unit manufactured from silicon wafers. Suitable for simple automation and control systems.

Pressurized Tank (Standard).description: A reinforced container for storing gases or liquids under pressure. Standard fitting for life support and fuel systems.

Composite Panels.description: Lightweight but durable panels made from polymer resins reinforced with basic fibers. Common internal hull material.

Heat Sink Assembly.description: A standard assembly of fins and coolant pipes designed to dissipate waste heat from machinery.

Advanced Alloy Frame.description: A structural frame built from plasteel or titanium alloys, offering a good balance of strength and weight for machinery or small vessels.

Shield Emitter Node (Basic).description: A component that projects a weak defensive energy field. Requires significant power.

Sensor Array (Type C).description: A standard commercial-grade sensor package capable of detecting nearby ships and basic astronomical phenomena.

Navigation Computer (Mk I).description: A dedicated computer for calculating jump vectors and managing sublight navigation. Basic model.

Plasma Injector Nozzle.description: A component designed to safely inject controlled bursts of plasma into reactors or weapon chambers.

Nanomesh Weaving Loom.description: Specialized machinery required to produce Woven Carbon Nanomesh from raw nanotubes.

Laser Focusing Crystal Array.description: An array of purified crystals used to amplify and focus energy beams for industrial cutting or laser weaponry.

Cryo-Cooling System.description: An advanced cooling unit utilizing cryo-stabilized gases to manage extreme temperatures in reactors or sensitive equipment.

Targeting Computer (Mk II).description: An upgraded targeting computer offering improved accuracy and multi-target tracking for ship weapons.

Heavy Shield Generator Node.description: A powerful shield node capable of sustaining a strong energy field, suitable for larger vessels or stations.

Precursor Interface Module.description: A complex device assembled from Precursor artifacts, seemingly designed to interact with their technology. Function mostly unknown.

Advanced Sensor Suite (Type A).description: Top-tier sensor package with long range, detailed scanning capabilities, and stealth detection features.

Automated Mining Drone.description: A self-contained drone equipped for basic asteroid mining operations. Can be deployed from a mothership.

Repair Nanite Swarm.description: A canister containing microscopic robots programmed for basic hull and system repairs. Consumed on use.

Jump Drive Coolant Pump.description: A specialized pump required for circulating coolant through hyperspace jump drives during operation.

Atmospheric Processor Unit.description: A device that filters and processes ambient atmosphere or gas stores to produce breathable air. Essential for life support.

Cargo Bay Expansion Module.description: A modular unit that can be fitted to increase a ship's cargo capacity. Requires installation.

Gravity Plating Emitter.description: Generates localized artificial gravity fields. Standard equipment for any habitable vessel or station.

Medical Bay Auto-Doc.description: An automated medical diagnostic and treatment unit. Can handle common injuries and illnesses.

Encrypted Datacore (Tier 1).description: A secure data storage device containing low-level corporate or military intelligence. Often sought after by information brokers.

AI Assistant Core (Basic).description: A simple artificial intelligence core capable of managing ship subsystems or basic automation tasks. Limited personality.

Quantum Entanglement Communicator.description: Allows instantaneous communication across vast distances, bypassing lightspeed limitations. Requires paired units.

Phase Cloaking Device Component.description: A key component for a device that temporarily shifts a vessel out of normal spacetime, rendering it invisible. Highly illegal in most systems.

Sentient AI Matrix.description: An advanced AI core exhibiting signs of true sentience and independent thought. Extremely rare and controversial.

Singularity Jump Drive Core.description: The heart of a top-tier FTL drive, manipulating micro-singularities to traverse interstellar space rapidly.

Neural Lace Interface.description: Allows direct mind-machine connection for enhanced control or data access. Requires surgical implantation.

Advanced CPU Cluster.description: A high-performance computing cluster used for complex simulations, advanced AI, or breaking encryption.

Hardlight Projector Module.description: Generates stable, tangible constructs of light. Used in advanced shielding, holographic interfaces, or specialized tools.

Encrypted Datacore (Tier 3).description: A heavily secured datacore containing highly sensitive faction secrets or classified research data.

Energy-to-Matter Converter Blueprint.description: Fragmentary blueprints for a theoretical device capable of converting pure energy into basic matter. Requires immense power.

Subspace Sensor Node.description: Detects anomalies and energy signatures that propagate through subspace, offering unique FTL tracking capabilities.

Void Crystal Fragment.description: A small, unstable shard of Void Crystal. Emits strange energies and distorts local reality slightly. Handle with extreme caution.

Temporal Distortion Field Emitter (Damag.description: A broken piece of technology that flickers with localized time slips. Unusable in its current state, possibly dangerous.

Unknown Biological Sample.description: A sealed container holding an uncatalogued biological entity or substance. Could be valuable research or a deadly biohazard.

Warp Field Stabilizer (Fragment).description: Part of a device intended to stabilize hyperspace or warp travel. Seems based on principles unknown to current science.

Echoes of Sentience.description: A strange energy pattern captured within a data crystal, exhibiting fleeting moments of awareness. Not true AI, something else.

Genesis Seed (Dormant).description: An artifact resembling a metallic seed pulsating with latent energy. Believed by some cults to hold the key to creating life or worlds.

Anomalous Energy Signature Data.description: Sensor logs capturing readings of an energy source that defies known physics. Valuable to researchers and fringe scientists.

Chunk of Frozen Time.description: A bizarre, shimmering object where time seems locally stopped. Touching it causes unpredictable temporal effects.
